birth_place.zh-cn: 大韩民国庆尚北道安东市
birth_place.en: Andong, North Gyeongsang Province, Republic of Korea

description.zh-cn: 韩国进步派政治人物及律师，现任韩国总统。曾任京畿道知事、城南市市长、共同民主党代表、韩国国会议员。
description.en: A South Korean progressive politician and lawyer, currently serving as the President of South Korea. Formerly served as the Governor of Gyeonggi Province, Mayor of Seongnam, leader of the Democratic Party, and a member of the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，第20任大韩民国总统。因宣布戒严而引发政治危机，后遭国会弹劾下台。
description.en: A South Korean politician who served as the 20th President of the Republic of Korea. He caused a political crisis by declaring martial law and was subsequently impeached and removed from office by the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 韩国的主要自由主义政党。李在明是该党的核心人物，并曾多次担任党代表。
description.en: The main liberal political party in South Korea. Lee Jae-myung is a key figure in the party and has served as its leader multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 李在明的妻子。
description.en: The wife of Lee Jae-myung.

description.zh-cn: 位于韩国首尔的私立研究型大学，李在明在此获得法学学位。
description.en: A private research university in Seoul, South Korea, where Lee Jae-myung earned his law degree.

description.zh-cn: 韩国庆尚北道的一个市，李在明的出生地。
description.en: A city in North Gyeongsang Province, South Korea, and the birthplace of Lee Jae-myung.

description.zh-cn: 韩国京畿道下辖的市，李在明曾于2010年至2018年担任该市市长。
description.en: A city in Gyeonggi Province, South Korea. Lee Jae-myung served as its mayor from 2010 to 2018.

description.zh-cn: 韩国人口最多的道，环绕首都首尔。李在明曾于2018年至2021年担任该道知事。
description.en: The most populous province in South Korea, surrounding the capital, Seoul. Lee Jae-myung served as its governor from 2018 to 2021.

description.zh-cn: 东亚国家，通称韩国。李在明于2025年6月4日就任第21任总统。
description.en: A country in East Asia, commonly known as South Korea. Lee Jae-myung was inaugurated as its 21st President on June 4, 2025.

en: National Assembly of the Republic of Korea

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的最高立法机关。李在明曾为国会议员。
description.en: The supreme legislature of the Republic of Korea. Lee Jae-myung was a member of the National Assembly.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国第20届总统选举，李在明在此次选举中以微弱劣势败给尹锡悦。
description.en: The 20th presidential election in the Republic of Korea, in which Lee Jae-myung was narrowly defeated by Yoon Suk Yeol.

description.zh-cn: 因尹锡悦遭弹劾而提前举行的大韩民国第21届总统选举，李在明在此次选举中获胜。
description.en: The 21st presidential election in the Republic of Korea, held early due to the impeachment of Yoon Suk Yeol, in which Lee Jae-myung was victorious.

description.zh-cn: 韩国前总统，因崔顺实事件被弹劾下台。李在明任城南市长期间与其在政策上多有摩擦。
description.en: Former President of South Korea, who was impeached and removed from office due to the Choi Soon-sil scandal. She had numerous policy conflicts with Lee Jae-myung during his tenure as Mayor of Seongnam.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，第19任大韩民国总统。曾在2017年共同民主党总统初选中击败李在明。
description.en: A South Korean politician who served as the 19th President of the Republic of Korea. He defeated Lee Jae-myung in the 2017 Democratic Party presidential primary.

description.zh-cn: 韩国前总统，其演讲影响了李在明，促使他成为人权律师。
description.en: Former President of South Korea whose speeches influenced Lee Jae-myung to become a human rights lawyer.

description.zh-cn: 时任韩国总统尹锡悦于2024年12月3日晚间宣布的紧急戒严状态，后被国会撤销。李在明在此事件中扮演了关键的反对角色。
description.en: A state of emergency martial law declared by then-President Yoon Suk Yeol on the night of December 3, 2024, which was later revoked by the National Assembly. Lee Jae-myung played a key opposition role in this event.

description.zh-cn: 因2024年韩国戒严危机，韩国国会针对总统尹锡悦发起的弹劾程序，最终导致其下台。
description.en: The impeachment process initiated by the South Korean National Assembly against President Yoon Suk Yeol following the 2024 martial law crisis, which ultimately led to his removal from office.

description.zh-cn: 韩国国民力量党政治人物，在2025年总统选举中败给李在明。
description.en: A politician from the People Power Party who was defeated by Lee Jae-myung in the 2025 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，曾在2006年城南市长选举中击败李在明。
description.en: A South Korean politician who defeated Lee Jae-myung in the 2006 Seongnam mayoral election.

description.zh-cn: 前韩国短道速滑运动员。李在明担任城南市长期间解散其所属的滑冰队，间接导致其转籍至俄罗斯。
description.en: A former South Korean short track speed skater. The dissolution of his skating team during Lee Jae-myung's tenure as Mayor of Seongnam indirectly led to his change of nationality to Russia.

description.zh-cn: 涉及前总统朴槿惠及其亲信崔顺实的政治丑闻，导致朴槿惠被弹劾。李在明在此事件后因积极发声而支持率大涨。
description.en: A political scandal involving former President Park Geun-hye and her confidante Choi Soon-sil, which led to Park's impeachment. Lee Jae-myung's approval ratings surged after he actively spoke out on the issue.

description.zh-cn: 韩国前总统朴槿惠的亲信，崔顺实事件的核心人物。
description.en: A confidante of former South Korean President Park Geun-hye and the central figure in the Choi Soon-sil scandal.

en: Supreme Prosecutors' Office of the Republic of Korea

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国的最高检察机关，曾多次对李在明提起诉讼和申请批捕。
description.en: The highest prosecution authority in the Republic of Korea, which has repeatedly filed lawsuits and sought arrest warrants for Lee Jae-myung.

description.zh-cn: 韩国政治人物，曾任法务部长官，期间对李在明发出了逮捕令。
description.en: A South Korean politician who served as the Minister of Justice and issued an arrest warrant for Lee Jae-myung during his tenure.

description.zh-cn: 美国政治人物，第45任及第47任美国总统。李在明因其言论风格曾被称为“韩国特朗普”。
description.en: An American politician who served as the 45th and 47th President of the United States. Lee Jae-myung has been called the 'Korean Trump' due to his rhetorical style.

description.zh-cn: 李在明于1991年与金惠景结婚。
description.en: Lee Jae-myung married Kim Hye-kyung in 1991.

description.zh-cn: 李在明出生于韩国庆尚北道安东市。
description.en: Lee Jae-myung was born in Andong, North Gyeongsang Province, South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 李在明于1986年进入中央大学学习，获得法学学位。
description.en: Lee Jae-myung entered Chung-Ang University in 1986 and obtained a law degree.

description.zh-cn: 李在明受到前总统卢武铉演讲的影响，决定成为一名人权和劳工律师。
description.en: Lee Jae-myung was influenced by the speeches of former president Roh Moo-hyun and decided to become a human rights and labor lawyer.

description.zh-cn: 李在明担任第19任城南市市长。
description.en: Lee Jae-myung served as the 19th Mayor of Seongnam.

description.zh-cn: 李在明担任第35任京畿道知事。
description.en: Lee Jae-myung served as the 35th Governor of Gyeonggi Province.

description.zh-cn: 李在明通过补选当选为第21届国会议员，并连任第22届。
description.en: Lee Jae-myung was elected as a member of the 21st National Assembly through a by-election and was re-elected for the 22nd term.

description.zh-cn: 李在明当选为第21任大韩民国总统。
description.en: Lee Jae-myung was elected as the 21st President of the Republic of Korea.

description.zh-cn: 李在明多次担任共同民主党及其前身的党员和党代表。
description.en: Lee Jae-myung has been a member and leader of the Democratic Party and its predecessors multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 在2006年城南市长选举中，李大烨击败了李在明。
description.en: In the 2006 Seongnam mayoral election, Lee Dae-yeop defeated Lee Jae-myung.

description.zh-cn: 李在明在担任城南市长期间，因财政和福利政策与时任总统朴槿惠发生严重摩擦。在崔顺实事件后，李在明猛烈抨击朴槿惠，并主张对其进行弹劾。
description.en: During his term as Mayor of Seongnam, Lee Jae-myung had severe friction with then-President Park Geun-hye over fiscal and welfare policies. After the Choi Soon-sil scandal, Lee Jae-myung fiercely criticized Park and advocated for her impeachment.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统朴槿惠通过成立专案调查小组、提案罢免、提交限制地方财政的法案等手段，试图阻碍李在明的市政运作。
description.en: Then-President Park Geun-hye attempted to obstruct Lee Jae-myung's municipal operations by means such as forming a special investigation team, proposing his dismissal, and submitting bills to restrict local finances.

description.zh-cn: 李在明担任城南市长期间，为解决财政问题解散了市政府的短道速滑队，这在一定程度上导致了队员安贤洙（维克多·安）转籍至俄罗斯。
description.en: During his tenure as Mayor of Seongnam, Lee Jae-myung disbanded the city hall's short track speed skating team to solve financial issues, which partly contributed to team member Ahn Hyun-soo (Viktor An) changing his nationality to Russia.

description.zh-cn: 崔顺实事件曝光后，李在明因率先猛烈抨击朴槿惠政府而获得大量关注，其政治支持率迅速上升。
description.en: After the Choi Soon-sil scandal was exposed, Lee Jae-myung gained significant attention for being the first to fiercely criticize the Park Geun-hye administration, leading to a rapid rise in his political approval ratings.

description.zh-cn: 在2017年共同民主党总统候选人党内选举中，文在寅获胜，从而阻止了李在明成为该党候选人。
description.en: In the 2017 Democratic Party presidential primary, Moon Jae-in won, thereby preventing Lee Jae-myung from becoming the party's candidate.

description.zh-cn: 尹锡悦在2022年总统选举中击败李在明。上任后，尹锡悦政府的检方多次对李在明发起调查并申请批捕。
description.en: Yoon Suk Yeol defeated Lee Jae-myung in the 2022 presidential election. After taking office, the prosecution under the Yoon administration launched multiple investigations and sought arrest warrants for Lee Jae-myung.

description.zh-cn: 在尹锡悦宣布戒严后，李在明通过社交媒体直播翻墙进入国会，并呼吁民众共同抵抗，对成功阻止戒严起到了关键作用。
description.en: After Yoon Suk Yeol declared martial law, Lee Jae-myung live-streamed himself climbing over the wall into the National Assembly and called on the public to resist, playing a key role in successfully thwarting the martial law.

description.zh-cn: 时任总统尹锡悦于2024年12月3日晚间发表紧急谈话，宣布全国进入紧急戒严状态。
description.en: Then-President Yoon Suk Yeol delivered an emergency address on the evening of December 3, 2024, declaring a state of emergency martial law nationwide.

description.zh-cn: 因宣布戒严，尹锡悦遭到国会弹劾并最终被罢免总统职务。
description.en: Due to the declaration of martial law, Yoon Suk Yeol was impeached by the National Assembly and ultimately removed from the presidency.

description.zh-cn: 李在明在2025年总统选举中击败了国民力量党的候选人金文洙。
description.en: Lee Jae-myung defeated the People Power Party candidate Kim Moon-soo in the 2025 presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 韩国检方以涉嫌贪腐、渎职、受贿等罪名多次对李在明提起诉讼并申请批捕。
description.en: South Korean prosecutors have repeatedly sued and sought arrest warrants for Lee Jae-myung on charges including corruption, dereliction of duty, and bribery.

description.zh-cn: 时任法务部长官韩东勋对李在明发出了逮捕令。
description.en: Then-Minister of Justice Han Dong-hoon issued an arrest warrant for Lee Jae-myung.

description.zh-cn: 李在明因其善用社交媒体、发表激烈言论以及煽动民粹主义的风格，被媒体与唐纳德·特朗普相比较，称为“韩国特朗普”。
description.en: Due to his adept use of social media, fiery rhetoric, and populist style, Lee Jae-myung has been compared by the media to Donald Trump and dubbed the 'Korean Trump'.
